other_tests.findings: Left ventricular systolic dysfunction with ejection fraction ___ and regional abnormalities. Evidence of left ventricular dyssynchrony likely related to left bundle branch block.
Mean pulmonary capillary wedge pressure (PCWP) of 30, pulmonary artery (PA) ___ with a mean of 41, and mean right atrial (RA) pressure of 15.

The liver, pancreas, spleen, and kidneys demonstrate normal morphology and echotexture. No gallstones, biliary ductal dilatation, or ascites identified. Atherosclerotic plaque found throughout the abdominal aorta.
